reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install... and our garage looks better/brighter
reviews.reviewText: This have a blue/white light rather than a yellow light. I installed them without tools in a minute or two... I was immediately impressed with how bright and evenly lit our whole garage is. They aren't blinding, because the light is spread so evenly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our full basement is unfinished and has those porcelain single bulb light fixtures. The builder only put 5 of them. While I have no plans to finish this space but I do store out of season items and want to creat a space to workout in and hated going down there because of how dim it was. I bought two and these four light units have lit up the entire space! Great design for a small investment!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and bright
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install and bright. I bought four about five years ago and they are still working great so I bought more to finish the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright and Compact
reviews.reviewText: These things are bright! They are nice and small, with adjustable "fins", allowing you to adjust the angle of the light. I have a two car garage, (with one large door for size reference). Previously I had two 75w bulbs in light sockets. These things are a lot brighter, but not so bright as to hurt your eyes if you look into them. The light they throw off covers about 85% of my garage extremely well, and the other 15% is pretty good (still better than the old incandescents). I can now look for tools in my tool chests and cabinets without the need for a flashlight. They are compact in size and screw in. Install took less than five minutes.Only negative is that they are so bright that from the curb of my driveway everyone can see into my garage and see what's in there with more clarity. Time will tell how long they last.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and very bright
reviews.reviewText: I only bought one set to start because I was skeptical as they were about half the price of the ones at Home Depot and Lowe's. The 5 light panels move easily but don't feel cheap and they stay in position where you put them making them very customizable for your space. The lights are very bright, I found one is enough to light up an entire two stall garage no problem. I ended up buying another pack for my basement and am very happy with my purchase. No complaints at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what I bought them for.
reviews.reviewText: I elected to replace dead and dying fluorescent bulbs and hardware in the laundry room and go all new. This worked famously. And at least in my case, was much cheaper than replacing the old hardware and dead bulbs with new fluorescents.Keep in mind these screw into a standard light socket. I have included a pic that hints of how I went about this. Also, these are very bright, and not a soft white. Boy, do they really light up a space. They are also much brighter than the fluorescents they replaced. Very happy with my decision and choice.One pic is showing with the entry light off, the other with both lights on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 Stars for Brightness!
reviews.reviewText: With only two lights in our garage, standard bulbs don't cut. That said, I'm shocked at the light these put out. They're impressive and definitely on my top 10 of must-haves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super bright for high garage ceilings
reviews.reviewText: We got these because we wanted BRIGHT in our cave-like garage that has high celings. It took a pole extension and a fancy light installation kit to get these in (we did pre-test the light bulbs before mounting them on a 15 ft ceiling, all good). We used a light bulb installation kit with 4 prongs, which took some jiggling to make work, but a kit with just the spring I don't think would have worked at all. It was able to install just fine, but removal may be more difficult, so hoping this lasts a while. I'll update if they don't.
Bought these for my Garage. Easy to install and provides so much light. Recommend
Bought these for my son for our large shed. He just loved them. Easy to install and provides so much light. Will be ordering more.
The lamps seem well made for the price and throw a lot of light. I use them in my garages and they are the best lamps I've used.
Have been a great buy from Amazon
They work great in my husbands man cave he just loves them
